tldr: The `atomic-polyfill` package will no longer be maintained. The author has archived the GitHub repository and mentions deprecation in project's README.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `atomic-polyfill` package from your application. Please take a look at `portable-atomic` instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
